heading: HB04481
0: AN ACT SEPARATING THE YUBO EXTENSION NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL IN BARANGAY YUBO, CITY OF LA CARLOTA, PROVINCE OF NEGROS OCCIDENTAL FROM LA GRANJA NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS YUBO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
